name: NEEAConsulting
description:
We are a consulting company for IT and Communications technologies based on Cloud Computing. We conducted the entire process of development, implementation, migration and support of advanced business applications.
Our team is composed of experienced and certified professionals in various fields, so you can respond quickly and effectively to our clients' needs, presenting innovative solutions and quality , with products certified and recognized quality.
Our solutions are the most advanced of the market , which combined with the extensive experience and background in IT and our extensive client base allows us to ensure they are safe bets , reliable, and increase the productivity of your business.
